DOC.brief_summary: 1. To estimate the absorption of a single oral dose of a controlled release varenicline tablet under fed and fasted conditions. 2. To evaluate the pharmacokinetics, safety, and tolerability of a single dose of a varenicline controlled release tablet under fed and fasted conditions.
DOC.brief_title: An Investigation Of The Effects Of Food On The Absorption Of A Varenicline Controlled Release Formulation
DOC.criteria: Healthy male or female adult smokers 18 to 55 years of age Sensitivity to varenicline Illegal drug use Pregnant or nursing females
